# This file is autogenerated by Autocmake v1.0.0-alpha-x http://autocmake.org
# Copyright (c) 2015-2016 by Radovan Bast, Jonas Juselius, and contributors.

# set minimum cmake version
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8 FATAL_ERROR)

# project name
project(MRChem)

# do not rebuild if rules (compiler flags) change
set(CMAKE_SKIP_RULE_DEPENDENCY TRUE)

# if CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE undefined, we set it to Debug
if(NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
    set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug")
endif()

#radovan fix for rt library not found (does not work yet...)
#list(REMOVE_ITEM CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES  "rt")

# directories which hold included cmake modules
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/compiler_flags)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/custom)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/downloaded)

# included cmake modules
include(autocmake_cc)
include(autocmake_cxx)
include(GNU.C)
include(GNU.CXX)
include(Intel.C)
include(Intel.CXX)
include(autocmake_mpi)
include(autocmake_omp)
include(autocmake_safeguards)
include(autocmake_version)
include(autocmake_code_coverage)
include(eigen)
include(tests)
include(python)
include(git)
include(initial_guess)
include(doxygen)
include(mw_filters)
include(main)
include(feature_summary)
include(autocmake_save_flags)
